title: Thrifty Traveler
text: A longtime competitor of [[Havulak Prospecting]] in [[Grindstone]], the Thrifty Traveler is a clutter of tents, outfits, and odds and ends that might be handy in the wilderness. Located in [[Summerfield]], the shop's proprietor "Thrifty Thom" undercuts any of Havulakâ€™s prices by a few copper pieces.
